SEARCH
Package gov.nasa.larcfm.ACCoRD

Class Alerter

java.lang.Object
gov.nasa.larcfm.ACCoRD.Alerter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParameterAcceptor, ParameterProvider
public class Alerter extends Object implements ParameterAcceptor
It is assumed that for all alert level i >= 1: detection(i+1) => detection(i) and that there is at least one guidance level whose region is different from NONE.

    Buffered_Phase_I_HAZ_corrective
    Buffered HAZ corrective thresholds, i.e., DTHR=1nmi, ZTHR=450ft, TTHR=35s, TCOA=20s, alerting time = 60s, early alerting time = 75s, bands region = MID

    Buffered_Phase_I_HAZ_preventive
    Buffered HAZ preventive thresholds, i.e., DTHR=1nmi, ZTHR=750ft, TTHR=35s, TCOA=20s, alerting time = 60s, early alerting time = 75s, bands region = NONE

    Alerting thresholds for ACCoRD's CD3D, i.e., separation is given by cylinder of 5nmi/1000ft.

      public void updateParameterData(ParameterData p)
      Description copied from interface: ParameterProvider

    • setParameters

      public void setParameters(ParameterData p)
      Description copied from interface: ParameterAcceptor
      Modify this object's parameters to match the given ParameterData object. Unrecognized keys are ignored. Any parameters in this object that are not in the given ParameterData object are left untouched.
      Specified by:
      setParameters in interface ParameterAcceptor
      Parameters:
      p - database of parameters
